title: Advance healthcare directives (notarized living wills)
dataVerified: Patient name, medical wishes, healthcare proxy, witness names, notary name, notary commission number, notary seal, directive date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents forged healthcare directives that could override patient wishes. Domain binding verifies notary commission. End-of-life decisions require authenticated advance directives. Hospital verification before implementing life-sustaining treatment decisions. Permanent legal records for medical decision-making. Prevents family disputes over patient care wishes. Critical for healthcare where directives determine life-or-death medical decisions.
